thread.title: Perfect Location out of Central Paris -
thread.title_full: Perfect Location out of Central Paris - Review of Ibis Paris Avenue d'Italie 13eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andy M
title: Perfect Location out of Central Paris -
text: I visited Paris for Christmas and required a good hotel away from the central buzz and at a good price. This happened to be the perfect location. For those who are first timers to Paris, like I was, this hotel is close to the Place d'Italie train station that connects you to any of the Paris main attractions within a 10 minutes ride with no connections. And the Paris Metro is a lot easier to navigate as compared to the London underground. The hotel itself was very clean and quiet, They served excellent continental breakfast and it is close to restaurants and a shopping mall. The staff were all very nice too.
